lines.text:
[after Hannes drove away, mistook Renate and another guy for her boyfriend and returned]
Well, young friend, what did you decide?
Right now I don't care anymore. I even work for you again.
Great. I knew I can rely on you.
But first I need a few days off.
What do you need?
I need to bring the buggy to Langenbach.
All right, but where, that I can take you with me straight away? Because a second time I won't let you go.
Paper factory "Schwarzer & Co".
[to the horse]
Giddyup!
[leaves]
See, Pfluger? Take him as an example for you.
I sure will. I will take off a few days too.
You must be crazy.
Can you work with horses?
No.
Good, then take care of the
Uwe, you're back!
And not only that. I brought guests from the high society.
From where?
From the High Society.
Oh, that doesn't matter.

[about the ]
This is the healthiest thing that exist, madam.
Healthy maybe. But alcohol?
Alcohol is very healthy. Else you couldn't leave animals in it for decades.

[before entering a hotel]
After you, beauty before intelligence.
Don't be silly.
Are you gonna look for work in the Black Forest?
Maybe later. Right now I will take a holiday.
How long do you have holiday?
Including the sundays and the public holidays... about 12 months a year.
We won't give the job without Mr. Cremer.
Of course not, my dear madam. We will find him, dead or alive.
We prefer alive.
With such manners people could engage you.
M'am, I'm priceless. If the I do it for a sigh from a pretty eye.
Uwe, I thought you are on the tramp.
You know me too bad. Do you think, i leave my friends alone? Now that you are rebuilding, you need a real carpenter.
We don't rebuilding for another 6 months.
No problem, I can wait.
I need to park the horses somewhere.
Young man, you can have from me whatever you want. Thanks to you the wedding will take place. If you like, put the horses in our bedroom.
They would prefer a barn.
There is a barn behind the house but hurry up. You and your darling girl are our guests of honor, of coruse.
